extension_name.description: The BetterCacher Chrome extension shows you on geocaching.com whether the cache is listed on BetterCacher.

extension_description.message: The BetterCacher Chrome extension shows you on geocaching.com whether the cache is listed on BetterCacher.
extension_description.description: The BetterCacher Chrome extension shows you on geocaching.com whether the cache is listed on BetterCacher. Made possible by the BetterCacher API. Supports the languages English and German.
